attributes.action: Send all high risk and repeat offenders to overseas jails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British jails are bursting at the seams - and with a vast amount of repeat offenders and high risk criminals, loving their SKY TV, pool playing, drug taking, gym, playstation lifestyle... hardly a deterrent for not re-offending - oh and don't forget the odd human rights compensation cash incentive.
Let them carry out their sentence somewhere remote (say China) who would welcome a fraction of what it costs here to incarcerate them in the UK - and I'm sure as hell they wouldn't want to go back after tasting what prison life should be like.
Basic food, no drug couriers, no SKY TV in fact it would be like a punishment...
